name: Zombie Invasion - A Survival Horror Game
name_original: Zombie Invasion - A Survival Horror Game
description:
In Zombie Invasion, your goal is to fight against an army of zombies and stay alive as long as possible. As the time goes by, the difficulty level becomes harder and more zombies attack you. A few minutes into the game, you'll be fighting against hundreds of zombies.

Use many weapons - Commando Knifes, Katana swords, Medieval Bows, as well as modern weapons like automatic guns (MK47, M4, MP5 etc), hand grenades, sniper rifles and more.

System Requirements:

♦ DirectX 11 must be installed on your computer and you must have a proper GPU that supports DirectX 11 in order to play Zombie Invasion.

♦ Zombie Invasion is compatible with x64 CPUs only.

♦ Zombie Invasion requires at least 4GB RAM and 1GB free space on your hard disk.
